tool_description: Validates certificate time-based validity by checking if the current time or specified time falls within the certificate's validity period (not before and not after dates).

certificate.description: Certificate to check for time validity

validation_time.description: Specific time to validate against (ISO 8601 format)

error_messages: Invalid certificate: Certificate data cannot be parsed or is malformed.
Invalid validation time: Validation time must be in valid ISO 8601 format.
Clock skew tolerance out of range: Must be between 0 and 3600 seconds.
Certificate validity dates malformed: Certificate contains invalid not_before or not_after dates.
usage: Provide certificate to validate. Optionally specify validation_time (defaults to current time) and clock_skew_tolerance. Returns validity status and timing information.

is_valid.description: Whether certificate is valid at the specified time

days_until_expiry.description: Number of days until certificate expires (negative if expired)

validation_time_used.description: The actual time used for validation
